page.title: Ship Renamer
page.descr: Text for Ship Renamer script by Cycrow
page.t: The base type of the ship \(IE. Nova\)
The variant type of the ship \(IE. Raider\)
The maker race of the ship \(IE. Argon\)
The short name of the current station
The full name of the ships homebase
The ships current command initials for some commands \(IE. ST/UT\)
The ships current command short name
The currently set ID of the ship
The currently set ID of the station/homebase
The current pilots trading skill \(IE. for ST/UT\)
The current sector the ship is in
The flags for the ship \(IE. M for managed, W for wingmen, etc\)
The class name of the ship \(IE. M5\)
The current use cargo space of the ship
The full type included variant of the ship \(IE. Nova Raider\)

page.descr: Commands for Ship Renamer script by Cycrow

page.title: Command Names
page.descr: Commands for Ship Renamer script by Cycrow

page.title: Command Names
page.descr: Commands for Ship Renamer script by Cycrow
page.t: The Automatic Ship Renamer will rename any homebased ships on this station based on the name string that's set.\n\nThe name string can contain a number of variables that will be dynamically updated on the ships name
